name: redirection.io
description:
This is the documentation of the public API of [redirection.io](https://redirection.io).
 
Our mission is to provide marketing, SEO and IT managers with the rights tools to manage the HTTP traffic of their website, get aware of browsing issues, and fix them right away with a friendly and easy to use solution.
